title: rAmA Ashrita
sahitya:
rAmA Ashrita dhAmA rAjita shrI maNI vAmA nijadhAmA


anupallavi

  bhUmApati sOmAvara kAmA ripu bhImA nAmApuri dAsAnuta bahu nAmA


caraNam    pavanAtmaja sharaNAgata caraNAmbuja ramaNA bhavaharaNA dhanur dharaNA
vara kALIpuravAsa sarOvarO dhyAna mandirA krSNa nirantarA pAhi sundarA
